about_the_game:
An eerie abandoned house to haunt your dreams for RPG Maker! Includes spooky animations to up the creepy factor.

The Haunted House tileset includes (in light, dark, ruined and normal versions):


Ground tiles:

Wood floor
Marble floor
Brick floor
Grass and grass edges on concrete and marble
Rug
Fancy tile
Grungy edges
Rocks, vines and weeds
Table
and more!


Walls:

Walls to match flooring
Fancy wallpaper
Stone texture
Window autotiles and panels
Hedges
and more!


Also included:

Windows with light, dark, and lightning flash animations
Curved staircase
Wood pillars
Panel overlays
Curtains + tattered version + animated "wind blowing" version
Kitchen setup with cabinets, food, etc
Bedroom with fancy bed and several blanket styles (small and large bed)
Bathroom tiles
Several types of chairs
Customizable bookcase with lots of book choices
Desks
Clocks
Bookcases
Paintings (includes three haunted paintings with eyes that can follow you!)
Lots of small decor items
Crates and barrels
Transparent overhead chandeliers
Purple roof assembly
Dead trees
Bushes and grass details
Lamppost with unlit, dim light, bright light, and broken versions
Cobwebs
Statues (with some broken)
Cracks and debris
Large fence (with animated gate)
and more!


Events and Animations:

Candlestick that operates as a switch. You can use it to trigger the...
Sliding bookcase! Access a secret passage through this!
Doors with lit, unlit and transparent versions
Curtains that blow in the wind (left and right versions)
Animated gate
Haunted portraits with shifting eyes
Windows with lightning animation! (An animation pattern is available in the sample maps.)
A haunted couch with 4 movement patterns - rise, wiggle, twist and crash.
Mouse holes with glowing eyes.
Rat animation
Treasure chest (with left/right version as well)
Drip animation
